verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He leadeth me, O blessed thought! O words with heavenly comfort fraught! What e’er I do, where e’er I be, Still ‘tis God’s hand that leadeth me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He leadeth me, He leadeth me, by His own hand he leadeth me, His faithful follower I would be, for by His hand he leadeth me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord, I would clasp Thy hand in mine, Nor ever murmur nor repine, Content whatever lot I see, Since ‘tis my God that leadeth me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And when my task on earth is done, When by Thy grace the vict’rys won, E’en death’s cold wave I will not flee, Since God through Jordan leadeth me.{/lang-eng}
